# producesCombinableFragments

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset writer outputs movie fragments suitable for combining with others.

## Declaration

```swift
var producesCombinableFragments: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. Set the value to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when you use multiple asset writers to produce distinct streams that complement each other, such as HLS encodings or bit rate variants.

You can’t set this property after writing starts.

## Configuring fragment output

- **movieFragmentInterval**: The interval at which to write movie fragments.
- **initialMovieFragmentInterval**: The interval at which to write the initial movie fragment.
- **initialMovieFragmentSequenceNumber**: The sequence number of the initial movie fragment.
- **overallDurationHint**: A hint of the final duration of the output file.
- **movieTimeScale**: The time scale of the movie.
